events.message: We have received the application for the software engineer position submitted by the candidate with relevant development experience.
The application has been reviewed and categorised under the Engineering cluster based on keywords like 'software' and 'developer' found in the resume.
A recruiter specialized in engineering roles has been assigned to manage this candidate's hiring process.
Conducted an initial screening call to evaluate the candidate's background in software development and DevOps practices.
The candidate responded promptly, expressing enthusiasm about the engineering role and confirming availability for interviews.
Scheduled a technical interview with the candidate to assess coding skills and software architecture knowledge.
